English: This event converts all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen into farmers/labourers if they are on your cores.
This decision converts all non-core / non-accepted craftsmen that are on your cores ONLY into farmers/labourers.
10 year reset before the decision can be taken again.
This decision is intended to convert non-accepted Bureaucrats into Artisans, in both states and colonies, so they stop getting fat off of state admin funding.
10 year reset before the decision can be taken again.
